title: A fake Banco on a french pizzeria
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826115934im_/http:/typophile.com/files/abricotiers_3926.png)

Good morning, could you help me to identify, this fake lower case Banco found on a french pizzeria ?  
Thanks for any help.  
SD

Font: 

 Sprint of Aldo Novarese 

Solved By: 

 [Mike F](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826115934/http:/typophile.com/user/3368 "View user profile.")
author: s.degeilh

comments.content: Thanks I thought it was a Novarese's design, but I didn't manage to find which one.

Just curious, Mike: Why do you always link to the old MyFonts site instead of the current, ‘new’ one? (It even isn’t <cite>that</cite> new any more, having been launched in 2009.) I think the new site offers a number of useful features that the old one is missing: You can, for instance, directly link to an [overview page](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826115934/http:/myfonts.us/td-Z6XniA) with your own sample text, there is a better [close-up view](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826115934/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sprint/sprint/glyphs/533079/51) of characters, you have much more sophisticated options for advanced [searching](http://web.archive.org/web/20140826115934/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/)—just saying …
